#summary Alien Blood Bath FAQs

Q: Is there sound?
A: Not yet. Code patches and sound samples are welcome.

Q: How many levels are there?
A: 3. Feel free to contribute a level editor and / or more levels. See the WIKI page on [http://code.google.com/p/alienbloodbath/wiki/LevelFormat creating new levels].

Q: Why is it so bad?
A. Code patches are welcome.
